name: content
schema: CREATE TABLE "content" (`automation_level` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `benchmark_version` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `content_type` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `control_count` NUMERIC DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL, `deprecated_at` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `description` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `documentation_url` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `featured_order` NUMERIC DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL, `github` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `id` TEXT PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT ('r'||lower(hex(randomblob(7)))) NOT NULL, `is_featured` BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE NOT NULL, `license` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `long_description` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `maintainer` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `name` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `release_date` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `slug` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `standard` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `status` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `stig_id` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `target` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `technology` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `vendor` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `version` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, "reference_url" TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, "readme_url" TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, "readme_markdown" TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, "primary_capability" TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, "packages" JSON DEFAULT NULL)
